text: Double Indemnity is a 1944 film noir movie about an insurance salesman (Fred MacMurray) and a housewife (Barbara Stanwyck). It was nominated for seven Academy Awards. == References == Category:1944 crime movies Category:1944 thriller movies Category:1940s crime thriller movies Category:Film noir Category:American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies about capital punishment
title: Double Indemnity
